DOC.brief_summary: This study aim verify patient nerve-related leg pain benefit neurodynamic treatment two week .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Neurodynamic Techniques Patients With Nerve-Related Leg Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Nerve-related leg pain ( NRLP ) although less prevalent low back pain , associate high economic social burden , consider predictor chronicity disability among subject low back pain . Numerous approach propose management ; however , evidence regard best therapeutic approach lacking . Neurodynamic technique propose effective manage NRLP . Thus , study aim verify , randomize control trial , effectiveness two-week program neurodynamic technique pain disability individual NRLP .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : unilateral leg pain ( Intensity ≥ 3 ) Pain distal buttock Reproduction symptom change symptoms structural differentiation ( cervical return neutral position ankle dorsiflexion ) slump test ; Exclusion criterion : cauda equina syndrome ; bilateral leg pain ; cross Lasègue sign ; previous surgery lumbar spine ; inflammatory arthropathy ; malignancy litigation workcompensation due back and/or leg pain receive physiotherapy treatment time baseline assessment
